item.description: FEBRUARY 24 (Sunday) SINGLES WALK and LUNCH at the lovely West Hartford Reservoir in Farmington starting at 11 am. What a nice way to spend a Sunday morning! The walk takes about an hour and the view of the water is great. After the walk, we'll go to an area restaurant for lunch. There is no charge for the walk. You buy your own lunch. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions: I-84 Exit 39 (Rt. 4), turn right at light, go past UCONN Medical Center, reservoir entrance on left, drive straight to back parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: I?ll be standing by my car in the parking lot.
item.why: You'll love it because we offer a relaxed, comfortable, welcoming atmosphere for you and other singles to socialize and have fun!

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
